name: Jim Oliver
what_you_do: Jim Oliver is an Emmy Award winning musician and composer who creates transformational healing music, blending art and science to promote self-healing and consciousness expansion.
who_you_serve: Jim serves individuals seeking healing and transformation through music, as well as participants in workshops and seminars focused on personal growth and wellness.
signature_programs: Harmonies of Light, Music Meditations and Inner Journeys
current_projects: Live Streaming Music and Light Events, Harmonies of Light
bio: Emmy Award winner, over 3500 hours of music composed, played live at the United Nations, top-rated series on World Puja Network.
business_focus: Jim Oliver is an Emmy Award winning musician and composer who creates transformational healing music, blending art and science to promote self-healing and consciousness expansion. (transformational music)
